xpeppers.interview.shoppingbasket

Class ShoppingBasketListBD

  • java.lang.Object
    • xpeppers.interview.shoppingbasket.ShoppingBasketListBD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShoppingBasketInterface

    public class ShoppingBasketListBD
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShoppingBasketInterface
    The Class ShoppingBasketListBD is based on two LinkedList - one for the Items and another for the quantities. "BD" in the Class name means BigDecimal. Due to the necessary tax rounding, the algorithm uses this kind of data structure for keeping and operating on decimal numbers.

      The Items list of this ShoppingBasket.
      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> quantityList
      Number of same Items.
      (package private) int scale
      The rounding scale used by BigDecimal.

      Returns the size of the list containing the items.
